title: Campaign Finance - Public Funds Approved
description: This dataset lists candidates who have been certified by the Ethics Commission as eligible to receive public funds. Each row represents a qualifying or matching request by a candidate that was approved by the Ethics Commission and the amount of funds to be issued. More information about San Francisco’s public financing program for qualified City candidates, visit the Ethics Commission’s Public Financing Program page.

columns.name: District
columns.description: Board of Supervisors or Mayor district sought by candidate

columns.name: Date of Submission
columns.description: Date that funds request was submitted

columns.name: Date Certified/Approved
columns.description: Date that funds request was approved

columns.name: Pending/Completed
columns.description: This column is no longer used

columns.name: Funds Approved
columns.description: Amount of public funds approved in request
